caption: Loved it. Always good service. Food was excellent. Great job Merus Grill...
Lovely establishment with delicious good and fantastic service!!!

On my continuing quest to find the best French dip in Houston, I landed at Merus grill. The French dip was really good. I rank it 2nd to Houston's/Hillstone based on the bread and aus jus. I will continue on
My GO TO for a meal out!! Great food, great service and cool modern atmosphere. Menu has a good variety to meet any mood. Best PEAR MARTINI in town!!!!!
Service and food was great.  Executive Chef Trevor Blaylock, came out to make sure everything was good.
OMG the prime rib!!

Took my mother for her 84 th birthday and told hostess to tell server to give check to my husband. He was the only man at table, instead the server gives bill to the birthday girl(84 yr old)! This was not what I asked for. Had a reservation and this was told twice to your hostess!!!! This makes me very upset.
The service was so nice and the food was AMAZING
Amazing service! So comfortable and the food and drinks were all top- shelf! 👍👍👍👍👍
Excellent food and excellent service.

Very good place to eat. The place looks really nice and has a lot of potential. Needs a little work on the waiters as we had 3 or 4 different people bring us food at random times haha. Other than that it was really exquisite. Might get something different next time around since it feels more gourmet. Great experience.

Great place. Probably my favorite currently as the menu is perfect for reasonable lunches of great quality and service while maintaining evening offerings that are a bit more substantial. The folks are just great throughout the staff-lines, …

This is the third time I have been at this restaurant.  This is the first time we sat at the bar.  The atmosphere it is fantastic and a hidden gem away from all the restaurants across the other side of the shopping center.  Robert he was …
Great food and staff.

My wife and I decided to try this place for her birthday/V-day. We wanted to go to a steakhouse but tried to make reservations too late apparently. However, as I looked up new places to try, this place popped up and reservations were wide …
Superior Atmosphere, Staff & Food!

Great experience. Our server did an outstanding job, but the last experience I went for my birthday and when I got there last night for valentines was disappointing. On my birthday I ordered a cucumbers martini and it just shaken vodka with …
Very Good
Nice place, food is delicious and the staff goes above and beyond. I had the Prime Rib with the smoked salmon dip. Would %100 recommend
One of the best value higher end restaurants you will ever find.
Stopped in for a quick drink, great atmosphere and the menu had some great items.

Great service. Really liked the special menu per day. We had the salmon dip. Was amazing! Loved and loved the precautions for Covid. The special sections at the bar.  For sure will come back to try other menu items.
This has become our favorite place to eat in Houston!!!!  First class all the way from the decor to the awesome food.  You must try this place!!!
Prime rib and Ceasar salad was amazing!
Great service, Great food
Great spot. Love the Ahi Tuna salad for lunch. Can't say I've ever had a bad dish at Merus.

Beautiful restaurant, great food, and my favorite: amazing staff. We got the French dip (delicious), Mac and cheese (pretty good), loaded baked potato (loved it), carrot cake (amazing, get this for sure). The manager Leo is wonderful along with a great and kind staff.
We went there for the first time tonight. Service was great. Our table had ribs, salmon, burger and the prime rib French dip. All were really good. We will definitely be back.
Deeeeeeeeelish and well spaced among guests!

This restaurant is such a gem! The food is absolutely amazing and the atmosphere is beautiful. Perfect for a date night, but also family friendly to where we brought our toddler for lunch on a Sunday. Whoever designed this place did an …

Great service, great food, reasonably priced wines and plenty of non-valet parking. Love this place.
The food was delicious.  The service was spectacular.
Good time had the French dip.  Service was great at the bar for food and drinks.
Great place to visit.. nice staff

This was my first time returning to a restaurant since March 2020,  the experience at Merus Grill was top service, atmosphere, food, only reason not five stars drinks ok. Will definitely return and highly recommend this restaurant.
Fantastic decor and environment. We ordered the prime rib and it was definitely extraordinary. The roasted cauliflower was superb. Will absolutely return.
Salmon is to die for....carrot cake and key lime...illegal...sooooo good

Never have I ever felt as welcomed and cared for at a restaurant than I have at Merus. My fiancé and I come here as often as we can as the genuinely sincere staff make our experience memorable after each visit. Desmond, Tehillah, and …

My boyfriend and I had a date night here just now and it was SO lovely! It was such an intimate and romantic ambiance. The quality of steak was also so good for the price and the service was outstanding. We will definitely be back!
Best Cauliflower. And the bartender was more than helpful

Absolutely LOVE this place! So elegant and intimate for a nice lunch or dinner. I’ve been probably 6 times in the past month. I always end up having the daily special. I like trying new things. My favorites include the avocado bomb, …
I haven't had a single dish I didn't like. I have eaten at least half the menu. The prime rib is great. Service is great too.

The artichoke appetizer was delicious. The Mac and Cheese was also very tasty. Great ambiance and the staff was very friendly and attentive. Prices are good for the quality of the food. There are lunch offerings too.
Great location with good atmosphere inside. Not too loud. Very classy. The restaurant team tip pools so the service is excellent! Food=delicious.
Excellent diverse menu, quality food, nice vibe.
Awesome food and excellent service every single time.  Love this place and its modern decor.
Excellent service, sexy chic atmosphere, and the food was delicious. The salmon burger was perfect! I'll definitely be back to try the dinner menu!
Amazing food and service.

Literally The best prime rib I have ever had in my life. The aus ju was perfection! I will be back. Plenty of free parking. Easy to find in Uptown.  My baked potato was huge!  The staff is friendly and really seem to love their job. Very …
Wow! Love me this place. Nice and serene. Food was delicious. Service prompt! Would definitely visit again....
Very delicious food and excellent service! Steak burger, most wonderful.  Excellent French fries, thin and crispy!
Love this place Great prime-rib and potatoes...very "Houston's" feel and hardwood smoke smell....love it!-B
Awesome food, atmosphere is sophisticated and great for meetings. The food is very good, hot and fresh!
Wonderful staff.  Great atmosphere.  Amazing food.
The food is absolutely delicious! Everything is fresh and the portion is very generous. Service is like a 5 star hotel. We have back many times already. Please come and support your local businesses.

Food is horrible prime rib was served very cold and manager was very rude and not respectable whatsoever they were complaining because we were mad that our food was cold and they did not want to do anything about it will never return here again do not waste your time or money
Service was great but the food was better!
Excellent service from the whole staff

They are awesom . Love the curbside togo

Some of the best food I've ever had Steak was amazing Mac and cheese was stunning Creme brulee was bliss

Delicious food! We had the salmon app/ avocado tuna app & a burger & topped it all off with the big @$$ chocolate dessert that comes with this huge ball of ice cream on top of chocolate syrup. Rich & delicious! We LOVED J Alexander's so we …
One of the best restaurant!!! Avocado Bomb and Slow Roasted Ribeye on the bone are EXCELLENT!!!
Good food, good service, good value
Everything was good
I love this restaurant,  the ambiance, staff and food is awesome!

Great restaurant and the menu is very similar to Houston’s.  Beautiful decor and the waitstaff is on their game.  The hostesses are a bit all over the place.  I have a young child and they tried to seat us in the bar area, after having …
Love this place. Great food and great service. Always get the Mac and cheese even with salad🙂

Ambiance and service are fabulous! I loved the modern look of the place and the service was awesome. I was not happy with my lunch tough. I had their Ahi Tuna Salad for lunch, and at $19.00 for a salad, I had a much higher expectation. …

This resturant is everything you could want in an upscale dining experience, plus more! I've visited at lunch time on a whim, dinner on a saturday, and made reservations for Valentines Day dinner, every single time the staff at Merus Grill …
Great atmosphere, great service, and great food!
Great food, service and out server Sammy was awesome

Went here for my birthday dinner end it was very lovely. Our server Chevonne was very professional and very polite. I tried the filet mignon and the English martini was very delicious. Will be definitely coming back to try other items on the menu.
Delicious food and Great service.
Food was delicious , Service was great will definitely be coming back .
The food here was great. My wife and I enjoyed the good food.

We walked in, having never been there before, to a beautiful dim-lit upscale restaurant. The place was quiet and private but still very welcoming. The restaurant employees were very polite and the atmosphere was inviting. We sat down at a …
Nice job on the redo of the space.....if your like Houston's you will like Merus Grill. Spinach queso dip is best.
Great Ambiance, I love the lighting; Great Food, Great Friendly Service; not a bank breaker!
Excellent food.   Best prime rib I've ever had!
Service was superb, great atmosphere and food for the price

Was hoping for a great experience and really want a restaurant to thrive at that location. Based upon our experience tonight, I'm not overly optimistic. My wife's food was simply "ok" (steak frites), which is fine but not enough to get us …
A Houston's replacement. Good food and service
Great place, Chicken Cesar salad is must try, service is awesome 👍
Actually I have a great experience for the work staff and the food they serve is delicious, it is located in a very nice area in the gallery. I do recommend it, of course yes
It is a great place to hang out, great access to parking space and shopping center around
Nice staff, beautiful restaurant and great wine list.  4 stars because the menu is to similar to Houston's. Change it up!
Friendly, attentive staff, beautiful restaurant, generous shareable plates. Outstanding customer service. Will definitely return.

My family and I read reviews before eating at this establishment and thought we would receive the same or even better service.After not eating all day and waiting to eat what seemed like an nice meal took a turn for the worst .I speak on my …

Had such a good experience at Merus Grill last week!  We started off with an Old Fashioned and a Tequila Martini on the cocktail menu. They give you an extra "sidecar" from the martini shaker on the side of the cocktail. Great value, and …
First time and enjoyed the food and drinks. Nice establishment, great staff. Would definitely recommend this place.
Fabulous experience! Barbora was fantastic as well as the food! Can't wait to come back xoxo brought friends since 1968!!

Great dinning room and friendly staff. I like the team orientated server approach. I was there for lunch with colleagues and was ideal, also can see it being a good place for evening meal for both business and personal.  The menu has …

Outstanding food and service!
Delicious from appetizers to desert!
Beautiful interior design and delicious food.
Great food, great service

Prime rib was outstanding! Desserts were off the chart too..... Must try
Definitely among the best in Houston!! Great service and great food!!

Merus Grill is new to Houston, and we were thrilled to have a new eatery in Uptown that satisfies the pallet!
